title: School Management System
description: Led the front-end development efforts for a School Management System designed to revolutionize administrative processes. The project leveraged React.js to deliver a dynamic and user-friendly platform and the system followed best practices for user experience and functionality.
features: Student information management: Manage student enrollment and academic history. display key academic information, such as grades, attendance, and upcoming assignments on the Dashboard
Staff information management: Manage teacher and staff information, such as personal details, employment history, and payroll details. Assign roles and responsibilities to teachers and staff members.
Timetable Management: Create and manage class schedules with details on time, subjects, teachers, and classrooms. Allocate subjects to specific teachers, time, and classrooms.
Attendance tracking: Implement a manual system to Track Student and Staff attendance and absences in real time and generate attendance reports.
Examination and Results: Plan and manage examination schedules. Publish exam results securely and allow students and parents to access them.
Grading and Report Cards: Record and calculate student grades for each subject and Generation of report cards and transcripts.
Assessment Management: Assign and track student assignments, and assessments and allow students and parents to access them.
Fee Management: Streamline the process of fee collection and generate invoices for fee payments. Tracking of payment history and overdue fees.
Accounting and finance: Manage school finances, including billing, and invoicing, and Automate financial reporting and analytics to provide real-time insights into revenue, expenses, and cash flow.
Inventory Management: Monitor and manage school supplies, equipment
Parent Portal: Allow parents to view their child's academic performance, attendance, exam results, and assignments.
Security and Access Control: Implement access control based on roles (teachers, students, administrators).
